name: CowSounds
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cow sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the sound of cows mooing.

You can add this skill as a part of your Routines.

Steps:

1. In your Alexa App, select Routines.
2. Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
3. Choose Skills / Your Skills.
4. Choose 'Cow Sounds'. Done.

You can now unlock premium features through the Premium Subscription.

It includes the following:

- Higher Sound Quality
- Cow sounds on infinite loop
priv:
